slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Poker dice is a game where you predict the outcome of a combination of 5 dice rolled by the dealer. Each die has 6 sides numbered 1-6 and follows a color rule (red and black).

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: The result of the dice is determined based on the highest ranking obtained from the combination of 5 dice (from 5 of a Kind to One Pair). Each round will only produce one outcome.

slide-3.title: How to Play
content: You can bet on dice combinations, and also on color, odd/even, or the most frequent small/big numbers. Only bets that match the criteria of the results will be paid out.
